neighboring objects) material.set_emission((R,G,B,A)) <.Material.set_emission> Shininess This controls the size of the specular highlight spot. In general,
larger numbers produce a smaller specular highlight, which makes the
object appear shinier. Smaller numbers produce a larger highlight, which
makes the object appear less shiny. material.set_shininess(0..128) <.Material.set_shininess> Specular This is the highlight color of an object: the color of small
highlight reflections. material.set_specular((R,G,B,A)) <.Material.set_specular>
